articles.headline: New England Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs denies accusations of assault and strangulation
articles.summary: Stefon Diggs faces serious legal allegations but has publicly denied the charges against him.

articles.headline: Father of NASCAR driver Denny Hamlin dies after house fire, mother critically injured
articles.summary: Denny Hamlin's family faces tragedy as his father passes away and his mother is left in critical condition following a house fire.

articles.headline: Drew Brees, Larry Fitzgerald lead Pro Football Hall of Fame modern-era finalists
articles.summary: Former NFL stars Drew Brees and Larry Fitzgerald are among the finalists for the Pro Football Hall of Fame's modern-era class.

articles.headline: USC Trojans defeat TCU Horned Frogs in Alamo Bowl
articles.summary: In a thrilling Alamo Bowl matchup, the USC Trojans narrowly lost to the TCU Horned Frogs, ending their season on a high note.

articles.headline: NFL playoff picture after Week 17: Who’s in and who’s out?
articles.summary: As the NFL regular season concludes, teams are finalizing their playoff positions heading into the postseason.

articles.headline: These fossil finds shed new light on the past in 2025
articles.summary: The year's top paleontological wonders ranged from a 540-million-year-old penis worm to a decades-old rodent impression.

articles.headline: Against the odds, a burbling lava planet retains an atmosphere
articles.summary: A newly discovered lava planet, TOI-561b, surprisingly retains an atmosphere despite its extreme conditions.

articles.headline: Even One Drink a Day May Raise Mouth Cancer Risk
articles.summary: New research suggests that even light alcohol use may carry serious risks, linking one standard drink a day to a 50% higher risk of mouth cancer.

articles.headline: Scientists Turn Carrot Waste Into Protein People Prefer
articles.summary: Researchers have developed a method to convert carrot processing leftovers into a nutritious protein source using edible fungi.

articles.headline: Astronomers Find Direct Evidence for Supermassive Stars in Early Universe
articles.summary: Astronomers have discovered direct evidence supporting the existence of supermassive stars that formed shortly after the Big Bang.

articles.headline: Nvidia sounds out TSMC on new H200 chip order as China demand jumps
articles.summary: Nvidia is scrambling to meet strong demand for its H200 artificial intelligence chips from Chinese technology companies and has approached TSMC to ramp up production.

articles.headline: Poland urges Brussels to probe TikTok over AI-generated content
articles.summary: Poland has called for an investigation into TikTok regarding the use of AI-generated content, raising concerns about its implications.

articles.headline: Musk's xAI buys third building to expand AI compute power
articles.summary: Elon Musk's xAI has acquired a third building to enhance its AI computing capabilities, signaling growth in the company's ambitions.

articles.headline: How AI shook the world in 2025 and what comes next
articles.summary: A retrospective on the impact of AI throughout 2025, examining its transformative effects and future predictions.

articles.headline: How Microsoft is betting on AI agents in Windows, dusting off a winning playbook from the past
articles.summary: Microsoft is integrating AI agents into Windows, reviving strategies that once made the OS dominant in an evolving tech landscape.
